Others: Jaker Ali was injured while fielding during the third ODI against Sri Lanka
Anamul Haque and Jaker Ali collided on the field
Jaker was carried off the field via stretcher
Soumya Sarkar had a neck injury after he struck the advertising board while stopping the ball
Mustafizur Rahman had to leave the game on a stretcher due to cramping
Tanzid Hasan was selected to replace Sarkar in cases of concussions
Umpire Tanvir Ahmed took over for Richard Kettleborough for the third ODI since he was unable to take the field owing to heat
